label: Trend/Rev/Stk
info: Trend count the consecutive higher higher (up) /lower lows (down).  Reverse counts the break from the last consecutive trend.  Streak counts the nubmer of days an asset has been rising/falling rapidly.  It is calculated by price being outside of ema 14 and ema 50, and ema 14 being outside of ema 50.

label: gap/night
info: When there is a large price movement overnight, this gap is usually filled later. Historial gap is an unfilled gap that happend a while ago,  and overnight gap is the gap from last night.

label: pattern
info: Candlestick pattern (E)ngulfing candle, (D)ouble top and (R)si divergence, (F)ibonacci Retracement, (3) bar play
